dialogues.text: Caesar silently climbs in the window; he looks around... immediately spots an unnerving, incongruous sight -- THE FRONT DOOR is BARRICADED WITH FURNITURE from the insi Confused, Caesar looks around, sees the area in total disarray: a SMALL STOCKPILE OF MUNITIONS lie scattered chaotically across a table, alongside a tray of HALF-EATE FOOD and the Colonel's SPILLED FLASK... Soaked in liquid from the flask is a PHOTO OF A LITTLE BO beside it OLD WAR MEDALS; Caesar peers around, wary: wher the Colonel...?

dialogues.speaker: IN FRONT OF THE CAMP
dialogues.text: A SERIES OF INTENSELY BRIGHT RAPIER MISSILES rip into the from atop the barrier wall, SOARING HIGH ABOVE THE ROCKY OUTCROPPING, illuminating the landscape below --

dialogues.speaker: TOP OF THE HOLE
dialogues.text: Bad Ape shudders, watching the missiles -- as they EXPLOD into the path of the armada -- TWO OF THE FRONT VEHICLES

dialogues.speaker: ERUPT
dialogues.text: Panicked, he frantically urges the children --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry!   Go go go! When A SUDDEN ROAR AND BLINDING FLASH makes him turn to s ARTILLERY SHELLS SOARING in return from the giant vehicle Bad Ape LUNGES protectively over nearby children -- when BOOOOMM!!!    The SHELLS MAKE IMPACT 30 feet from the wal DEBRIS HAILS DOWN on our group as they hug the ground!

dialogues.speaker: THE TUNNELS BELOW
dialogues.text: They stop, look around in fear as the space RUMBLES VIOLE around them -- alarmed, ROCKET begins pushing his way thr the crush to get to the other end, gripping his rifle -- ROCKET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [Let me through!]

dialogues.speaker: CAESAR IN THE WARDEN'S TOWER
dialogues.text: He whips his head at the sound of continued shelling -- panicked, he rushes to the window to see INCOMING MISSILE FROM THE ARMADA beginning to make IMPACT INSIDE THE YARD When a QUIET CRASH comes from somewhere close behind him. Caesar turns, startled, gaze fixing apprehensively on a PARTIALLY OPENED DOORWAY; he steels himself, and slowly approaches the door. He hesitates, wary... then carefully peers around the doo frame, glimpsing a BROKEN COLEMAN LAMP at the foot of a s table; kerosine still pools from the lamp's base. Beyond the door, Caesar suddenly hears labored breathing. He pushes it open to REVEAL...

dialogues.speaker: THE COLONEL'S SLEEPING QUARTERS
dialogues.text: The Colonel is splayed on his stomach across a military c head lowered, his outstretched hand trembles mid-air as h struggles in a total daze, like a drunk, grasping helples for something out of reach on the table... HIS PISTOL. Heart racing, Caesar crosses silently to the table... eye glued to the Colonel, he places his hand firmly on the gu before the Colonel can get to it. Caesar lifts the gun slowly, then trains it down at the Colonel beneath him, who is so out of it he continues listlessly groping for a gun that isn't there. Caesar glares down at the Colonel, pitiless... his expres hardening as he prepares to finish him, once and for all -- when the Colonel slowly lifts his head to peer up at Caesar... and for the first time, Caesar sees there is BL smeared on his face from under his nose.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The Colonel's eyes look desperate, like a wounded animal' he opens his mouth pleadingly, trying to speak -- but the only sounds that come are eerie, GASPING GRUNTS... Caesar stares back in utter shock -- when he notices something on the floor near the bed... It's Nova's crude RAG DOLL, silently gazing up at him, no flecked with the Colonel's blood. Reeling, Caesar unconsciously lowers the gun -- but as th Colonel reaches lamely for it, Caesar instantly remembers himself, raising the weapon threateningly again at his he But the Colonel doesn't even flinch, the barrel just inch from his face. He begins quietly gasping once more; Caesa watches, unnerved, finger on the trigger, as the Colonel lifts himself, slowly leaning his head forward... ...and pressing his own temple against the muzzle -- he l up at Caesar, his tortured eyes pleading mutely for death

dialogues.speaker: HOLD ON CAESAR
dialogues.text: as he stares down, haunted... his gaze shifting from the Colonel's agonized face... to the gun in his hand... Finally, horrified, he slowly LOWERS THE GUN. Self-awaren returns to his eyes -- a look of humanity we haven't full seen since before the death of his family, as if the war within him is finally coming to an end. The Colonel gapes helplessly... as Caesar, quietly stunne his own decision, starts to back away... Caesar pauses, pitying eyes on the Colonel's; then finally, he gently se the gun back down onto the table. A look of confused gratitude flickers through the Colonel primitive gaze... and he resumes REACHING LAMELY for the Eyes still on him, Caesar backs slowly out --

dialogues.speaker: INTO THE CONTROL ROOM
dialogues.text: We see Caesar, his back to us, as he continues gazing int the Colonel's sleeping quarters... then, after a quiet, clumsy fumbling sound, a SINGLE GUNSHOT echoes from the r Caesar remains still, then lowers his head as day breaks outside...

dialogues.speaker: UP ON THE BARRIER WALL
dialogues.text: Through SWIRLING SNOW we see RED and other TURNCOATS arri at one of the posts, laden with ammo for the troops who hurriedly load their weapons, preparing for the imminent firefight once the rapidly approaching armada arrives. As Red hands bullet belts to a GUNNER loading a big .50 cal machine gun -- Soldiers around them unleash another round of Rapier miss -- WHOOOOSH -- two more MLRS vehicles EXPLODE on the hori Soldiers around the missile launcher react with raucous cheers to the direct hits, a sense that the battle's thei to win -- -- when the GUNNER beside Red suddenly NOTICES THE APES scrambling by the rock out-cropping -- his jaw drops, in complete shock! GUNNER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screams to the others)

dialogues.speaker: LOOK
dialogues.text: Red spins with disbelief to see the apes below -- as the Gunner rotates his machine gun -- and OPENS FIRE!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Caesar about to climb out -- when he SEES the apes taking heavy fire from gunners on the wall! He freezes, terror-stricken, grappling for a way to save them -- when eyes lock on the TANKER CARS just beneath the wall -- He quickly turns from the window, charging back into the control room -- when -- A SUDDEN BANGING comes from the front door -- EXECUTIVE OFFICER (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Colonel!   Are you in there?! Colonel! Caesar spins, startled -- then finishes grabbing a BANDOL OF GRENADES off the table strewn with the Colonel's belongings -- he bolts for the window -- when -- CRASH! The door SMASHES OPEN -- Caesar turns to see the X AND HIS MEN ENTERING -- they see him too -- raising their weapons, and FIRING AS -- CAESAR LEAPS

dialogues.speaker: OUT THROUGH THE WINDOW
dialogues.text: HE SWINGS DOWN FROM THE TOWER LEDGE -- and GRASPS onto th FLAGPOLE stretched across the open space beneath -- the p breaks his fall, but only so much -- as ONE SIDE SNAPS FR Caesar hangs on, riding the swinging pole as it descends and finally releasing it, tumbling to the ground! Caesar scrambles to his feet, still clutching the grenade -- when the Officer and his men appear in the tower windo They OPEN FIRE -- as Caesar sprints away -- bullets teari up snow and ice right behind him as he goes -- !

dialogues.speaker: ROCKET
dialogues.text: DESPERATELY FIRING Boyle's automatic rifle, trying to pro cover for the FLEEING APES who are now PINNED BELOW IN CH -- as BEHIND HIM ON THE ROCKS, Bad Ape and another HORDE APES are gathered helplessly around the hole, some apes s crawling out to discover there's now nowhere to go...

dialogues.speaker: UP ON THE BARRIER WALL
dialogues.text: The Gunner ducks from Rocket's bullets, then jumps back u returning a mad volley from his machine gun, SHOUTING ove the din to the other soldiers firing beside him -- GUNNER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill them, man!!!   Kill them all!!! REVEAL RED behind them, watching the apes under attack -- SOUND FADES as he gazes, unexpectedly disturbed by the si -- when A MUFFLED VOICE rises out of the silence -- GUNNER (O.S.) (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Donkey -- DONKEY!!! Red SNAPS OUT OF IT, turning to the exasperated Gunner -- GUNNER (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: GET THE GRENADE LAUNCHER
dialogues.text: Flustered, Red turns, moves to his rucksack, retrieving t launcher -- when he stops suddenly, SEEING --

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: QUADRUPEDING at great speed for the yard, as another inco mortar hits the ground -- Caesar DARTS HARD around the fr of the pen -- and fearlessly straight through the PLUMING DEBRIS and SWIRLING SNOW -- a heroic battlefield image! Mesmerized, Red watches motionless as Caesar charges fearlessly through the chaos toward the TANKER directly beneath gunners on the wall! Caesar continues through the smoke and debris -- finally grabbing one of the grenades from the bandolier -- eyes f on the tanker just 30 feet away -- rearing back, about to pull the pin -- WHEN SUDDENLY --

dialogues.speaker: CAESAR DROPS, CLUTCHING HIS SIDE
dialogues.text: Shocked, Red watches as Caesar, in agony, touches his abdomen, discovering BLOOD; Caesar reaches behind him to he's been shot in the back with a CROSSBOW ARROW... Red looks up to see -- PREACHER stalking through the haze snow, out of the pen area, almost shocked himself at what has just done -- he nervously loads another arrow, in tur as he moves toward Caesar. Gasping in pain, Caesar SNAPS the arrow from his side, an turns, seeing Preacher too... Red stands frozen, gripped by the sight of Caesar lying t helpless --

dialogues.speaker: GODAMMIT
dialogues.text: Red turns, startled, to find the Gunner screaming at him, momentarily turned from the battle --

dialogues.speaker: LAUNCHER
dialogues.text: Red suddenly looks at the weapon in his hands, rememberin what he was ordered to do -- still returning to his sense he nods to the Gunner -- who immediately turns back to th battle, FIRING RELENTLESSLY at the apes...

dialogues.speaker: CAESAR ON THE GROUND
dialogues.text: as he sees Preacher anxiously closing in... Caesar's eyes frantically dart for an avenue of escape, but there is no

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: His pained gaze returns to Preacher who comes to a stop j 25 feet away, hesitating, torn -- then, finally steeling himself, he raises the LOADED CROSSBOW -- when -- FSSSSSSST--KABLOOM! Preacher DISAPPEARS in a HUGE BLAST!!

dialogues.speaker: QUIET RINGING --
dialogues.text: Stunned, disoriented, Caesar looks around him, deafened, finally peering up to discover -- RED ON THE WALL holding the SMOKING LAUNCHER, looking dow stoically. Caesar can't believe it... He gazes up in shock at -- RED, who just gazes back, calmly holding the weapon, almo in a state of peace -- while BEHIND HIM -- THE GUNNER turns, suddenly realizing what Red has just do freaking out, his SCREAMING INAUDIBLE to Caesar's ringing ears -- the Gunner pulls out his PISTOL -- pointing it at Red, who doesn't even react -- we see just a split-second his SILENT MUZZLE FLASH -- when we CUT --

dialogues.speaker: CAESAR
dialogues.text: as he takes in the grim sight, pained -- THEN -- THE GUNNER turns and takes aim at CAESAR! Caesar scrambles, the sounds around him (and us) suddenly starting to return -- as -- he SNATCHES UP THE GRENADE fr the ground beside him -- jumping to his feet -- -- narrowly dodging the Gunner's bullets tearing up earth around him -- as he PULLS THE PIN from the grenade, desperately LAUNCHING it straight for the tanker beneath wall -- The Gunner's alarmed eyes suddenly whip toward the tanker as Caesar takes off, sprinting in the opposite direction -- when the grenade EXPLODES and THE TANKER ERUPTS -- ENGULFING the WALL beside it, and consuming all the Gunne above in its INCREDIBLE BLAST!!! Caesar races into the adult pen -- as behind him, FLAMES CLIMB HIGH INTO THE SKY -- when SUDDENLY -- THE TRAIN CAR

dialogues.speaker: NEXT TO THE TANKER EXPLODES TOO
dialogues.text: Still running, Caesar steals a startled look back -- as

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He DIVES down into the hole -- as --
